title: Historiography URLs: URL Extraction and Analysis Tools for Academic Journal Corpora
description: A collection of Python scripts for extracting, combining, searching, and analyzing URLs from large historiography text corpora. This toolkit can process academic journal articles to extract and catalog web references, DOIs, and other URLs mentioned in scholarly literature. The project includes tools for PDF text extraction, URL pattern matching (strict and lenient modes), JSON data manipulation, and search functionality.
